
CREATE TABLE orders (
    id INT,
    restaurant_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    deliver_date DATE
);

INSERT INTO orders (id, restaurant_id, customer_id, order_date, deliver_date) 
VALUES
(1, 101, 1001, '2024-01-01', '2024-01-03'),

SELECT * 
FROM orders 
LIMIT 30;
